issue.title: Deploy web app
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14046](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14046). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Deploy the new app:
 \* Firebase app infra, or
 \* Github web pages
